title: Trump rips Supreme Court ahead of its birthright citizenship ruling
shortDescription: Trump argued against the Supreme Court making the 'wrong' decision in a pending case about birthright citizenship, which he opposes.

title: Democrats say they'll ensure Trump's new 15% tariffs are temporary
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is trying to use a different law to impose new 15% global tariffs. But Democrats say they'll ensure the taxes are temporary.

title: C-SPAN addresses rumors that viral call was from Trump
shortDescription: After a man with a speech pattern similar to the president's called C-SPAN using a pseudonym Trump once favored, speculation spread.

title: Judge permanently blocks release of Trump classified documents report
shortDescription: Judge Aileen Cannon said releasing special counsel Jack Smith's report would detail alleged criminal wrongdoing in a case that never went to trial.

title: Trump threatens 'obnoxious' new tariffs after Supreme Court setback
shortDescription: Trump immediately imposed 15% temporary tariffs to replace the emergency ones that the Supreme Court struck down, and said there may be more to come.

title: What is Donald Trump's approval rating? See state comparison
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's approval ratings could be an indication of the GOP's midterm outcomes. See what some states think of his job performance.

title: World reacts to new Trump tariff plan
shortDescription: The European Union is set to freeze the ratification process of its trade deal with the U.S., according to Bloomberg News.

title: Trump said he'd end Ukraine war in a single day. Is peace close?
shortDescription: Experts say Vladimir Putin has peruaded U.S. negotiators that he wants to cut a deal â€“ even as Moscow rains missiles and drones on Ukrainian cities.

title: What to know about previous threats against Trump after Mar-a-Lago breach
shortDescription: An armed man was killed by U.S. Secret Service on Feb. 22 after he breached Trump's Mar-a-Lago property, the latest threat against the president.

title: Greenland says 'no thank you' to Trump hospital boat
shortDescription: Greenland rejected President Donald Trump's bid to send a hospital boat, as tension between the Danish territory and the United States reignited.

title: 6-in-10 Americans disapprove of Trump, new poll says
shortDescription: In a new poll released two days before Trump's highly anticipated address to Congress, 60%, said they disapprove of his performance.

title: Why is Trump sending a hospital ship to Greenland? It's unclear.
shortDescription: The president said he was working with Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry to send a hospital boat to the Danish territory: "It's on the way!!!"

title: Which Dem candidate can beat GOP in Texas Senate race? See new poll.
shortDescription: A new poll suggests U.S. Rep. Jasmine Crockett could beat Attorney General Ken Paxton in the Texas U.S. Senate general election, despite a tight Democratic primary.

title: Businesses celebrate win at Supreme Court over Trump on tariffs
shortDescription: Thousands of companies - not just those that sued the Trump administration - will now decide whether to pursue refunds.

title: Who voted against tariffs? Supreme Court strikes down Trump's tariffs
shortDescription: The decision on the tariffs was made 6-3. So, how did each of the nine justices vote?
